bands.name: TB_ASL_Theta_B_V

bands.description: DQX for surface level TB for V polarisation

bands.description: DQX for top of the atmosphere TB for H polarisation

bands.description: DQX for top of the atmosphere TB for V polarisation

bands.description: Global quality index

bands.description: Retrieval fit quality index

bands.name: Chi_2_P
bands.description: Chi square high value acceptability probability

bands.name: N_Wild
bands.description: Number of times that wild data occurred

bands.name: M_AVA0
bands.description: Initial number of TB measurements available in L1c

bands.name: M_AVA
bands.description: Preprocessing - number of TB measurements available for retrieval

bands.name: AFP
bands.description: Mean Surface of the antenna Footprint ellipses on Earth

bands.description: Counter view - number of views that flag is set off to AF_FOV_flag

bands.description: Counter view - number of views that flag is set on to Sun_Tails flag

bands.name: N_Sun_Glint_Area
bands.description: Counter view - number of views that flag is set on to Sun_Glint_Area flag

bands.name: N_Sun_FOV
bands.description: Counter view - number of views that flag is set on Sun_FOV flag

bands.name: N_Instrument_Error
bands.description: This counts the number of TBs that pass the initial TB filtering and have the L1c Instrument_Error_Flag ON

bands.name: N_Software_Error
bands.description: This counts the number of TBs that pass the initial TB filtering and have the L1c Software_Error_flag ON

bands.name: N_ADF_Error
bands.description: This counts the number of TBs that pass the initial TB filtering and have the L1c ADF_Error_flag on

bands.name: N_Calibration_Error
bands.description: This counts the number of TBs that pass the initial TB filtering and have the L1c Calibration_Error_flag ON

bands.name: N_X_Band
bands.description: This counts the number of TBs that pass the initial TB fitering and have L1c X-Band ON

bands.description: Science flags

bands.description: Strong galactic source

bands.description: Branches of Decision Tree S

bands.description: Retrieval R2, R3 or R4

bands.description: DGG current flags

bands.name: HR_Cur_DQX
bands.description: This is a special HR DQX value computed using a special sigma corresponding to the case where HR is completely free

bands.description: Count of deleted TBs due to suspected RFI

bands.name: N_RFI_Y
bands.description: Count of deleted TBs due to suspected RFI

bands.description: Grid point ID

bands.description: Latitude (-90, 90)

bands.description: Flag indicating Land/Sea USGS content, Coastline distance, and Ice content
